# AI Tool

### OpenAI Integration

You have to save the Api-Key on the .env file with the follwing name, which will make the template fully functional for AI features

```
OPENAI_API_KEY=YOUR_API_KEY
```

1. [Installation](/docs/installation)
2. [Authentication](/docs/authentication)
3. [Database Setup - PostgreSQL](/docs/database)
4. [Sanity Integration](/docs/sanity)
5. [Markdown Integration](/docs/markdown)
6. [Stripe Integration](/docs/stripe)
